text: Woman in a Hat () is a 1985 Polish drama movie directed by Stanisław Różewicz and starring Hanna Mikuc, Maria Czubasiewicz, Wiesława Mazurkiewicz, Barbara Dziekan, Krzysztof Gosztyla, Tomasz Lengren. ==Other websites== * Category:1985 drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Stanisław Różewicz
title: Woman in a Hat
